name: webcube-projects
description: Continuously updated JS infrastructure for modern web dev

scripts.update: npm run clear:deps && yarn install && echo 1.0 > .webcube-version
scripts.upgrade: npm run clear:lock && npm run update
scripts.clear:deps: lerna clean --yes 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf ./node_modules 2>/dev/null || true && lerna exec --bail=false -- rm yarn.lock package-lock.json 2>/dev/null || true
